title: YASUO Too weak?
body:
I don't know if anyone agrees with me in saying this, but due to all the nerfs to him, yasuo has become really weak like how his w passive was removed, his base health dropped significantly and many more things. He can easily get squashed in laning phase by many champions including:
Malzahar
Zed
Riven
Just to name a few. I'm a yasuo main myself and I really think he needs a buff to him sometime

replies.body: Nidalee has a jump on a 2 second. Better nerf Kassadin

> [{quoted}](name=Riso,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=N3eEFzgb,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-02-22T10:49:05.404+0000)
>
> Nidalee has a jump on a 2 second. Better nerf Kassadin

The 2 second cooldown is only if you kill anyone in Cougar form or jump to anyone who's hunted. Other than that, the cooldown is reasonable. Not to mention it covers %%%%all distance.
I was just joking. Don't need to get mad over it

And Riot has said this before, Yasuo is a hypercarry. His laning is SUPPOSED to be bad because his late game and his teamfight presence is ridiculous.

And even for that, I'd say he's still a fairly strong laner. Near infinite dashes to confuse/dodge your opponent. Wind-Wall and shield. Good at harassing and getting out too. And at level 6, you have SOME kill pressure. Not as much as other champs at 6, but still some.

I don't think Yasuo wins any lane unless your simply better than your opponent. But once he hits 2 items, goodbye anything squishy.

Hyper carries shouldn't be allowed to win lane anyway imo they should go even at best in a pure champion v champion stand point (not taking into account player skill)

Wtf are you serious? he is still like the most op champ even after the nerfs. It is kass that needs to be fixed his ulty range 700 down to 450 like really why so much they should of made 550-600 if he is still op nerf him to 500 or a bit more like kass is such a major nerf it is no longer for escapes.
his w does need a buff but other then that hes  fine
his w does need a buff but other then that its fine

"Yasuo is weak because his direct counters are strong against him, please buff."

You are actually stupid, i want this to be clear.

Yasuo is still ridiculously strong, but in a more balanced way. 
The champions you listed him as weak against are champions that are usually strong against the type of champion yasuo is.

* Malzahar is the dream dualist with a silence, suppression and tonnes of damage. In order to kill one you will need a QSS and a gank from another lane/jungler.

* Zed excels against squishy champions but is easy to focus once he has used everything up (granted you can survive). I have often heard the yas vs zed lane reffered to a skill matchup. 

* Riven just has all the mobility, utility and damage... lets not even go there.
